alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Prairie; Richland; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:36PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Roosevelt, eastern McCone, northwestern Prairie, Dawson and western Richland Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 435 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Poplar to 13 miles west of Lindsay. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poplar, Culbertson, Circle, Brockton, Richey, Bloomfield, West Glendive, Brockway, Lambert, Vida, Lindsay, Fort Kipp, Enid, Sprole and Forest Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Prairie; Richland; Western Roosevelt
